title: Health Insurance Benefits
text: The company provides comprehensive health insurance covering medical, dental, and vision for all full-time employees.

title: Provident Fund
text: The company contributes to the employee provident fund as per government regulations.

title: Performance Bonus
text: Employees are eligible for annual performance bonuses based on appraisal ratings.

title: Work From Home Benefits
text: Employees may work from home up to two days per week depending on project requirements.
